title: ChiptuneMusic1
description: This is a package of melodic chiptune music loops suitable for classic games, 8-bit games, arcade games, and mini-games
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/HKh9KvOLFOQ


This is a package of melodic chiptune music loops suitable for classic games, 8-bit games, arcade games, and mini-games.

  • 6 Track, 16 Loop
  • 22 Audio, 22 Cue


File.

  • Jellybean Jive FullMix
  • Phantom Pixels FullMix
  • Pixel Power FullMix
  • Pudding Pirates FullMix
  • Sapphire Sea FullMix
  • Skyward Garden FullMix
  • Jellybean Jive Loop
  • Marshmallow Mountain Loop
  • Maze of Fantasy Loop
  • Phantom Pixels Loop
  • Pixel Power Loop
  • Planetary Mission Loop
  • Plushie Parade Loop
  • Pudding Pirates Loop
  • Puppys Adventure Loop
  • Sapphire Sea Loop
  • Shining Crystal Loop
  • Skyward Garden Loop
  • Space Journey Loop
  • Starlight Picnic Loop
  • Unicorn Dreams Loop
  • Wonderful World Loop


※ Copyright Notice!

This asset package is safe from copyright claims and warnings on YouTube. You are free to use this product as you wish, including for commercial projects, without any issues.


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
